mapper.update: update tbrolepermission set lPermissionId = #{lpermissionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lRoleId = #{lroleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, strDescription = #{strdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nState = #{nstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dtCreateTime = #{dtcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dtModifyTime = #{dtmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where lId = #{lid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select lId, lPermissionId, lRoleId, strDescription, nState, dtCreateTime, dtModifyTime from tbrolepermission
